mapper.select: select id, institution_id,activity_type, title, name, price,old_price,sale_count, thumb_img, adver_img,short_detail from child_activity order by create_time desc LIMIT #{page.pageNo},#{page.pageSize}

select
from child_activity
where title like CONCAT('%',#{searchItem},'%') or name like CONCAT('%',#{searchItem},'%')
order by create_time desc LIMIT #{page.pageNo},#{page.pageSize}
